title: Automatically Fill Official PDF Forms Online
subtitle: Upload a fillable PDF, fill the fields, and get back a ready-to-submit form.
note: Max file size 10MB. PDFs without form fields will return an error.
no_fields_found: No form fields found in this PDF.
ai_text_label: Tell us anything you want to fill
ai_text_placeholder: Example: My name is John Doe, I live in Chicago, zip code 60661, email john@example.com, phone 555-1234...
ai_helper: AI will only fill empty fields. It won't overwrite fields you've already filled.
feedback_placeholder:
Examples:
- Change the address to 123 Main St
- Remove notes section
- Correct email typo
- Make the name uppercase
preview_fallback: Your browser may not support inline PDF preview.

errors.select_pdf_first: Please select a PDF file first.
errors.no_form_fields: This PDF does not contain fillable form fields. Please upload a PDF with interactive form fields (AcroForm).
errors.enter_text_extract: Please enter some text to extract from.
errors.ai_unavailable: AI extraction is not available. Set OPENAI_API_KEY to enable.
errors.fill_success: PDF filled successfully! Review the preview below.
errors.provide_feedback: Please provide feedback on what to fix.
errors.ai_correction_unavailable: AI correction is not available. Set OPENAI_API_KEY to enable.
errors.ai_invalid_response: AI returned invalid response. Please try again.
errors.no_field_values: No form field values provided. Please fill the form fields.
errors.daily_limit_reached: Daily free limit reached. Upgrade to continue filling forms today.
errors.upgraded: You are now Pro. Unlimited fills and no watermark are enabled.
errors.canceled: Checkout canceled. You can continue using the free tier.
errors.ai_could_not_extract: AI could not extract new information from your text. Please fill fields manually or try different wording.
